title: My Face Is Paralysed - What Will My Blind Date Think? | DATING DIFFERENT

media:group.media:title: My Face Is Paralysed - What Will My Blind Date Think? | DATING DIFFERENT
media:group.media:description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

AUSTIN, 24, from NYC has Moebius syndrome and says dating as a 'gay disabled man is hard' and wants people to know that he is just a normal person who wants companionship. Austin hopes that his blind date will ‘see past his disability’ and ‘love every part of him’. He hopes to educate them and teach them that ‘living with a disability is not scary’. The singer tells Truly that: "It’s been really hard meeting new people with facial paralysis." Meanwhile, Nic is a dog sitter and a model, and also has no idea what to expect going into his first blind date. Will the two hit it off and will sparks fly?
